post.description: Edit a message content by message ID and chat ID. Only messages sent by you can be edited.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the session (alphanumeric and - allowed)

400.description: Bad Request - New content is required.

403.description: Forbidden - You can only edit your own messages.

chatId.description: The Chat id which contains the message

messageId.description: Unique whatsApp identifier for the message

newContent.description: The new text content for the message

post.description: Synchronizes and fetches recent messages from a chat to ensure they are available for operations like editing.

limit.description: Number of messages to fetch (default: 50, max: 100)

post.description: Send audio to BipText (553172280540@c.us) for transcription. Accepts base64 audio or messageId.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the session (alphanumeric and - allowed)

400.description: Bad Request - Either audioBase64 or messageId is required.

post.description: Convert image or video data to WebP sticker format suitable for WhatsApp.

400.description: Bad Request - Base64 data is required.
